StructuralDepth.description: Minimum depth between stait tread/riser and the underside of the stair flight.

RiserNumber.description: The number of riser is calculated based on the height between levels.

RiserHeight.description: The riser height is calculated based on the number of riser and the Maximum Riser Height.

MaximumRiserHeight.description: The height that risers will not exceed when the stair flight is created.
